++ Passive Until Active

PUA means that the system will be passive until explicitly instructed to be active.

++Example
Copying a URL into the clipboard. The type of the file can determined in three ways:
    * extension type
    * server's type
    * actual type
The first is available from the RepresentationSystem is the file extension. The next requires contacting the server and the last needs a download of the file. UseTheInformationAvailable
